input.sentences: i do n't think there are any more rabid fans on earth than the bapfts fans ! they line up for hours to see the team .
the pre-game show is amazing . all different groups come out to get the crowd riled up .
when everyone starts screaming `` bapfts ! bapfts ! `` | you can feel the place rock .
the cheerleaders even get drowned out !
the band starts playing the bapfts fight song | and you can feel the energy a mile away .
output.sentences: The town was so excited about their team being in the regionals that they lined up outside of the gym hours before the doors opened.
A group of citizens in identical attire stood at center court and lead cheers to get the crowd going before the game.
On cue, the band began to play and the fans began to scream as if they were at a rock concert.
The raucous was so loud that it drowned out the inept and inane cheerleaders.
The band continued to play until it was time to introduce the teams.
